entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
